Re:belay is Pure Canyoning

Re:belay is born out of passion.

Passion for adventure. For nature. Passion for travel, photography, for friendship. Passion for canyoning.

Re:belay is a collection of epic canyoning descents, stories, interviews, gear shouts and apparel aimed at inspiring canyoneers to not only practice, but live the sport.

Re:belay is pure canyoning.

Editor-in-chief:
Gus Schiavon

Contributors:

Writers, photographers, filmmakers who are passionate about canyoning: this is a space for you.
